thread.title: Disney Doodle: Mrs. Potts Bubbles With Excitement at Disney’s Grand Floridian Resort & Spa
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Mrs. Potts Bubbles With Excitement at Disney’s Grand Floridian Resort & Spa

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Mrs. Potts Bubbles With Excitement at Disney’s Grand Floridian Resort & Spa
text:
Did you see the new live-action film “ Beauty and the Beast ” over the weekend?
In this week’s Disney Doodle, artist Ashley Taylor imagines Mrs. Potts celebrating the film’s opening by heading to Disney’s Grand Floridian Resort & Spa to indulge in the relaxing tea service the resort offers.
“Having tea at the Grand Floridian is one of my favorite experiences at Walt Disney World !” she said. “Between the beautiful atmosphere and loving piano music, Mrs. Potts would absolutely spend all of her time there!”
